title: Vulnlog Vulnerability Analysis Verdict Not Affected Schema

vex.title: VEX Justification
vex.description: The VEX (Vulnerability Exploitability eXchange) justification describes why a component is not affected by a vulnerability. This helps explain the security posture and reasoning behind a 'not affected' verdict.
enum: Vulnerable code cannot be controlled by adversary
Vulnerable code not in execute path
